They appreciate the velvet material, with one noting it's perfect for outdoor fall events, and like its color, with one describing it as stretchy and rich. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made for the price! More than I expected!
items.body: This dress is perfect! It fits, the material is soft and well made. There is even a button on the cleavage to hold it closed or you can leave it open for a deeper V. It’s beautiful! I’m 5’2” and the length is perfect. I ordered a large to accommodate my chest. Read more
items.author: meaghan morgan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of compliments recieved!
items.body: I wore this dress to a December wedding at 22 weeks pregnant! The quality was fabulous and I received a ton of compliments, and and felt stunning all evening. I was comfortable when sitting for the ceremony and when I was out on the dance floor and the heavier velvet fabric flowed perfectly. I plan on wearing this same dress to a formal event and another wedding I have in January. Once I have this baby, I will be getting this one altered to fit my non-pregnancy body! Note: The V neck had a little peep hole, but nothing a little safety pin or needle and thread couldn't fix if you wanted to close the gap! Read more
items.author: Brooke Cannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS DRESS!
items.body: I’m 5’2” size 12-14 & ordered the XL. Fits perfectly including the length, which falls exactly at my ankles. I would say this dress is true to size with stretch & the elastic waistline. It’s very comfy & fits in all the right places. The sleeves lay nicely and aren’t too snug. The button at the bust doesn’t gape. It’s low enough to offer a hint of boob while still feeling wedding-appropriate. I love how it feels when I’m in it & I honestly flitted around my house for an hour like Cinderella after I tried it on for the first time. The dark green is lovely. It’s a decent value for the price. I think it’s an excellent purchase that I’m genuinely excited to wear. Quality is decent for an Amazon buy. Its on the thicker side & feels just as soft and velvety as I hoped it would. Read more
items.author: Katie E.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but my DDD chest did not fit
items.body: This dress was gorgeous and as many have said, good quality. Unfortunately, i have huge boobs. Maybe even bigger than DDD, and the slit at the front gaped. I considered sewing up the gap but it would still be pretty low cut for the wedding i am going to. I found another style they have of this dress that is knee lenghty but fits my bust, has long sleeves and is just as gorgeous and less low cut. I recommend at least trying this dress because if it does fit, it is defintely worth the price. It made my waist look amazing and slim, which is often hard for me because i have a small waist and huge chest so finding something that sinches in at the waist and isnt too big there is usually hard. minus one star because they only go up to an Xl in this. an XXL would have probably solved my chest problems :) Read more
items.author: Claire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color
items.body: Fits great! Material is soft and stretchy. Looks great with flats or heels. Color is true and it holds up well after washing/drying. Read more
items.author: NancyNan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering. Comfortable and great for petites.
items.body: Wore this for Thanksgiving and received a ton of compliments. Very comfortable! I’m 5’ tall and it was a great length on me. Came back to order it in another color! Ordered a small and it fit great! I did air it out when I opened the package. There was a little bit of a smell to it. Read more
items.author: momoftwogirls

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy yet dressy
items.body: Super comfy and forgiving. Allows for great cleavage but also has a button if you want more coverage. TBH I don’t think I’d ever use that - it looks kinda awkward but nice regardless. Got for a “highland formal” fall wedding in Edinburgh and think it’ll work well for that and for a Christmas party. Snagged it on sale and feel even better about the purchase. Read more
items.author: B H

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent Dress, but a few flaws
items.body: The dress is decent, but it just did not do it for me. It is a nice velvet and would be a good winter dress, but the stripes and sleeves are giving Renaissance Faire and I did not like the V neck cut. Overall it was pretty and fairly flattering, but a bit of a miss. For reference I am 5'6, 145lbs and ordered a M and it fit well. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: M#velvet-emerald Green, M#velvet-caramel, N#velvet-black, N#velvet-haze Blue, M#velvet-coffee Brown, R#sequin-striped Velvet-navy Blue, M#velvet-purple, N#velvet-red, P#velvet-brown, M#velvet-burgundy, M#velvet-royal Blue, R#sequin-striped Velvet-black, N#velvet-dark Green, P#velvet-pumpkin. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
